title: Advanced Learning in Politics and International Relations Using Videoconferencing Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory political science and international relations theories
context.additional_context: Flexible scheduling reflecting the characteristics of office/administrative working learners, combining non-real-time LMS and video conferencing technology to enhance interaction

learning_goals: Learners can discuss with experts from non-Western countries using videoconferencing technology and explain multicultural perspectives on international relations.
Learners enhance critical thinking skills by analyzing materials provided through LMS and videoconferencing platforms and applying them to evaluate political phenomena.
Learners demonstrate higher-order thinking by utilizing real-time collaboration tools during videoconferencing to engage in collective problem-solving with peer learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
